net.sf.sanity4j.util
Class QaLogger

java.lang.Object
  net.sf.sanity4j.util.QaLogger
Direct Known Subclasses:
QaLoggerAntImpl, QaLoggerJTextAreaImpl, QaLoggerMavenImpl, QaLoggerSystemOutImpl
public abstract class QaLogger
extends Object

Since the QA task can utilise several logging libs, it needs to provide its own logging facade. The logger defaults to System.out until another logger is initialised.

Since:
Sanity4J 1.0
Author:
Yiannis Paschalidis

Method Detail

setLogger

public static void setLogger(QaLogger logger)
Sets the logger to use. This logger will be the one returned by getInstance().

Parameters:
logger - the logger to set.

getInstance

public static QaLogger getInstance()
Returns:
an instance of the logger

message - The text to log. Should not be null.
